scripts.start: npm run copy-clarity && ng serve --ssl --proxy-config proxy.conf.json
scripts.build:local:prod: ng build --prod --deploy-url assets/ && npm run copy-clarity && npm run build:move
scripts.build:local:dev: ng build --deploy-url assets/ && npm run copy-clarity && npm run build:move
scripts.clear-contracts-e2e: docker exec -it $DB_CONTAINER ./cockroach sql --insecure --safe-updates=false -e "SET DATABASE = helen; DELETE FROM contracts;"
scripts.clear-users-e2e: docker exec -it $DB_CONTAINER ./cockroach sql --insecure --safe-updates=false -e "SET DATABASE = helen; DELETE FROM users;"
scripts.create-user-e2e: docker exec -it $DB_CONTAINER ./cockroach sql --insecure -e "SET DATABASE = helen; INSERT INTO users (userid, email, first_name, last_name, name, password, role, consortium_consortiumid, organization_organizationid, last_login) VALUES (999999, 'admin@blockchain.local', 'Test', 'User', 'Test User', '\$2a\$04\$ChnseApH8oWVE/D/zL9KYeo/vhCR0Ejz6dQvePAtDDSX2bnTYln7e', 'SYSTEM_ADMIN', 2, 1, 0);"
scripts.unaccept-agreement: docker exec -it $DB_CONTAINER ./cockroach sql --insecure -e "SET DATABASE = helen; UPDATE agreements SET accepted = false WHERE id = 1;"
scripts.setup-db: npm run clear-data-e2e && npm run create-user-e2e && npm run unaccept-agreement
scripts.clear-data-e2e: npm run clear-contracts-e2e && npm run clear-users-e2e
